nodes.text: Larep Reza was a Kalleran male who served as the Vice Chancellor under Chancellor Lina Soh of the Galactic Republic. A rising star in the Galactic Senate, Reza was seen to be the most likely to succeed Soh, and was the subject of many gossipvids. After Soh was injured during a Nihil marauder attack on the Republic Fair on the planet Valo, Reza temporarily held the position of acting chancellor.
